data.meta_description: Find latest news around Mahesh Bhupathi, Tennis Player from India at NDTV Sports for more update and information log on to sports.ndtv.com.
data.text:
So Near Yet So Far: India's 4th-place Olympic Heartbreaks

India have missed out on an Olympic medal by one spot on eight different occasions.

"For The Sake Of IPL...": Tennis Legend Writes To BCCI, Wants RCB Sold

Facing SunRisers Hyderabad at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium, the Faf du Plessis conceded 287 in 20 overs - the most in IPL's history.

Focussing On Singles Way To Go For Indian Players: Leander Paes And Mahesh Bhupathi

Tennis legends Leander Paes and Mahesh Bhupathi are not in favour of more Indians choosing doubles over singles, saying the highest accolades in the sport go to individual performers.

Davis Cup: Indian Tennis Players Need To Give Their All Against Finland

India's singles players will need to back their talent with some killer instinct for the team to emerge victorious against a reasonably strong Finland in the Davis Cup World Group I tie.

"They Just Don't Care": Mahesh Bhupathi Slams AITA In Olympic Qualification Row

Tokyo Olympics: The absence of Rohan Bopanna from the Indian tennis contingent for the Tokyo Games has not gone down well with the players, with Bopanna, Sania Mirza and now Mahesh Bhupathi taking up the issue.

Leander Paes, Mahesh Bhupathi Hint At "Another Chapter" On 22nd Anniversary Of Wimbledon Win

Indian tennis legends Leander Paes and Mahesh Bhupathi hinted at "another chapter" of their association on the 22nd anniversary of their Wimbledon title win in 1999.

AITA To Subject Junior Players To Age Verification Test During Nationals

Waking up to tackle the menace of age fraud in Indian tennis, national federation AITA has decided to subject all junior players entering the national championships to age verification test
